result.title: Forecast scenarios of media transformation in the participating countries and in Europe as a whole.
result.description: Deliverable provides scenarios of media transformation in the participating country groups. Deliverable explains the tensions between the goals and motives of content producers and users, as well as other actors. Deliverable also presents the verbal narratives of possible ROs scenarios.
